goal.en: Cooperating with the course “Fundamentals of Electronics II““ in the last semester, this experimental class aims to let students prove the circuit theory by themselves through the experiments. Students will get familiar to the operation of various measurement instruments through the experiments, which can provide the necessary training for future work or research.
goal.ch: 搭配基礎電學II所學的內容, 透過實驗操作來驗證所學的原理, 並使學生熟悉各種量測儀器的操作, 訓練未來工作或研究上的基礎能力.

content.en:
Exp.1 BJT amplifier
Exp.2 Frequency response of amplifier
Exp.3 Current mirror and its applications
Exp.4 Cascade and cascode amplifier
Exp.5 Basic logic gate and its applications
Exp.6 Decoder, adder and multiplier
Exp.7 Flip-flop and its applications
Exp.8 Differential amplifier
Exp.9 Feedback circuit and its applications
content.ch:
Exp.1 BJT放大器特性量測
Exp.2 放大器頻率響應
Exp.3 電流鏡及其應用
Exp.4 串接及疊接放大器特性量測
Exp.5 基礎邏輯閘及其應用
Exp.6 解碼器、加法器及乘法器
Exp.7 Flip-flop電路及其應用
